extendedInfo.description: Red Alert is a red and blue warning flashlight.It is simple to use,and a key to start.It can effectively help in case of an emergency you call for help or warning signal lights.Low power consumption, highlighting, easy-to-use, free, cool its largest Features.You can also be used to prank friends, more interesting use of the scene waiting for you to discover.* In an emergency, call 911 or your local emergency number immediately from any wired or wireless phone.
